comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: www.chatib.us
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.chatib.us/#](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chatib.us%2F%23) ### Comment > Etsy ad problem ust started today. Previously AdGuard blocked all ads on this site. Etsy ad flashes on and off about every 3 seconds and rotates between 3 different Etsy ad overlays. One version has Etsy ad at top of page plus Etsy ad right in middle of page so we can't see what's underneath ! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/6UzwEPh.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 11 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.11+(54) Browser: | Chrome AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Self-destructing third-party cookies (0) DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.title: www.etsy.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/647327604/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2Fuk%2Flisting%2F647327604%2F) ### Comment > Site won't load, leaves a blank white screen with '429 Too Many Requests'. I had this with numerous Etsy links I had saved with AdGuard turned on on Mac O/S 12.6.4 (21G526) > I don't have a GitHub account. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/iYL9YdD.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/0iTb2Tz.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.10.0.1272+release Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block third-party Authorization header,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (10),
Self-destructing third-party cookies (0),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184) DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `AdGurad DNS` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
EasyList Italy,
Liste AR Userscripts: | I don't know. Your questions assume a lot of tech knowledge. Link below was in here aleeady so I just left it. Web+of+Trust+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-wot/1.0/wot.user.js),
AdGuard+Popup+Blocker+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js),
AdGuard+Assistant+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js),
AdGuard+Extra+(url:+https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Other extensions used: | Don't track me Google, Google Container, Protect My Choices, Privacy Possum, Duck Duck Go, Facebook Container, Firefox Multi Account Containers, Malwarebytes Browser Guard, Bit Defender Traffic Light. I turned them all OFF and tested again from new link, but still had the same issue. It's only on Mac though, same link works fine on iOS.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/search?q=photo+frame&ref=search_bar](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dphoto%2Bframe%26ref%3Dsearch_bar) ### Comment Username: @kittymmeow > With the AdGuard Base filter list enabled on the search page on Etsy, everything is blocked EXCEPT the ads. Ads on Etsy are listed with "Ad by Etsy seller", and with the filter list those are the only products that appear in search with everything else blocked. First screenshot is with all my listed filters and extensions enabled, 2nd screenshot the only change is that the AdGuard Base filter list has been disabled from uBlockOrigin, all other lists still enabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uwLycl2.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/LBBzHg0.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlockOrigin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
Fanboy's Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
List-KR Other extensions used: | pi-hole, Privacy Badger

issue.title: cotterfuneralhome.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

cotterfuneralhome.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||reports.hibu.com^

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
